name: planmorph-backend
description: Backend for AI-driven tech consultancy website

scripts.init-db: node -e "import('pg').then(({default: pg}) => { const pool = new pg.Pool({ connectionString: process.env.DATABASE_URL }); pool.query(require('fs').readFileSync('./init.sql', 'utf8')).then(() => { console.log('Database initialized'); pool.end(); }).catch(console.error); })"
